name: ParameterGroup
description: The AWS::ElastiCache::ParameterGroup type creates a new cache parameter group. Cache parameter groups control the parameters for a cache cluster.

properties.name: CacheParameterGroupFamily
properties.description: The name of the cache parameter group family that the cache parameter group can be used with.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description for the Cache Parameter Group.

properties.name: Properties
properties.description: A comma-delimited list of parameter name/value pairs. For more information, go to ModifyCacheParameterGroup in the Amazon ElastiCache API Reference Guide.
